nodes.text: Rii Jenks was a Bith male who operated the Rii Jenks Cantina on the planet Formos during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Jenks paid regular bribes to Imperial agents and Hutt crime lords to prevent them from interfering in his business, and he also took steps to avoid coming into conflict with the various smugglers that operated on Formos, by offering them the use of his bar as a safe-house and storeroom.
